title: Game-Based Language Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and Understanding of Fundamental Language Learning Theories
context.additional_context: Aims to acquire practical language skills applicable to adult learners' daily lives, providing an immersive learning environment through game mechanics

learning_goals: Learners can utilize situationally appropriate language expressions with 80% or higher accuracy in VR-based simulation environments.
Learners can explain at least three ways game design elements (points, levels, feedback) influence language learning motivation.
Learners can design a simple educational game scenario and revise it at least twice based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
